Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
goofy \goofy\ adj. foolish and silly, or appearing silly; as, he wore a goofy hat.
Syn: cockamamie, cockamamy, fool(prenominal), sappy, silly, wacky, zany, unreasonable. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]

goofy adj : pungent adjectives of disesteem; "gave me a cockamamie reason for not going"; "wore a goofy hat"; "a silly idea"; "some wacky plan for selling more books" [syn: {cockamamie}, {cockamamy}, {sappy}, {silly}, {wacky}, {whacky}, {zany}, {unreasonable}] n : a cartoon character created by Walt Disney [also: {goofiest}, {goofier}]
